name: when user taps on the filter icon on the list screen, user should be presented with the transaction filter screen
description: User tries to view Transaction Filter Screen
descriptionHtml: User tries to view Transaction Filter Screen

testStage.description: User tries to view Transaction Filter Screen

steps.name: I accept the new terms and conditions
I get the text "TRANSACTIONS" from the Account Screen
I check that the application text: "TRANSACTIONS" is equals to expected value: "TRANSACTIONS"
I click filter purchase History Icon on Transactions screen
I check filter text on Transactions Filter screen
I check that the application text: "Filters" is equals to expected value: "Filters"
I check purchase type text on Transactions Filter screen
I check that the application text: "Purchase type" is equals to expected value: "Purchase type"
I check that the "Close Button" is displayed

labels.name: parentSuite
labels.value: GMAP INGO Mobile Test Automation - [ANDROID PARALLEL XML SUITE]
